# iru_prism_device_information (Data Source)

List device information from Prism.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_prism_device_information" "example" {}

output "device_details" {
  value = data.iru_prism_device_information.example.results
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Maximum number of results to return.
- `offset` (Number) Number of results to skip.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `results` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--results))

- `agent_installed` (Boolean)
- `device_capacity` (Number)
- `device_id` (String)

- `mdm_enabled` (Boolean)
- `model_name` (String)
